name: TransformedBag_transformedBagTest
description: Unit tests for the TransformedBag.transformedBag method.

test_cases.name: testTransformedBagWithNonEmptyBag
test_cases.description: Tests the TransformedBag.transformedBag method with a non-empty Bag, verifying that the transformer is applied to each element and the resulting Bag is not null.

test_cases.name: testTransformedBagWithEmptyBag
test_cases.description: Tests the TransformedBag.transformedBag method with an empty Bag, verifying that no transformation occurs and the resulting Bag is not null.
